generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

arguments.value: Ownable: new owner is the zero a
Ownable: caller is not the owner

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
This contract allows users to learn by using their NFT robots. 
Users can join the game by transferring their robots to the contract, 
and the contract will start a learning process based on the robot's level. 
Users can upgrade their robots' level by paying tokens and waiting for a period of time. 
The contract rewards users with tokens for participating in the learning process.

allows users to upgrade the level of their robot NFT if they have enough balance. 
It checks if the robot NFT is valid and the user has enough balance to pay the price of upgrading the level.

confirms that the user's robot is ready to upgrade to the next level, 
updates the 'PendingBlockUpgradeLevelRobotNFT' to 0,
and upgrades the level of the robot.
allows the user who called the function to start their robot's learning process

rewards a specified 'user' with bonus tokens based on the level of their robot and
a specified 'totalBlockLearned' value.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ConfirmUpgradeLevelRobot().notice: confirms that the user's robot is ready to upgrade to the next level,  updates the 'PendingBlockUpgradeLevelRobotNFT' to 0, and upgrades the level of the robot.

ForRobotNFTToLearn().notice: allows the user who called the function to start their robot's learning process

UpgradeLevelRobot().notice: allows users to upgrade the level of their robot NFT if they have enough balance.  It checks if the robot NFT is valid and the user has enough balance to pay the price of upgrading the level.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to learn by using their NFT robots.  Users can join the game by transferring their robots to the contract,  and the contract will start a learning process based on the robot's level.  Users can upgrade their robots' level by paying tokens and waiting for a period of time.  The contract rewards users with tokens for participating in the learning process.
